meanings.sent1: The doctor specializes in urologic issues.
meanings.sent2: She had a urologic examination at the hospital.
meanings.sent3: The urologic clinic had a long line of patients waiting.
meanings.sent4: His dedication to urologic research was unwavering.
meanings.sent5: The urologic problems were finally resolved with surgery.

meanings.definition: Involving the study or treatment of diseases of the urinary system
meanings.sent1: The urologic department at the hospital is always busy.
meanings.sent2: They discussed the latest urologic advancements in the conference.
meanings.sent3: The urologic textbook had colorful illustrations.
meanings.sent4: Her urologic expertise saved many lives.
meanings.sent5: The urologic research team made groundbreaking discoveries.
